attributes.action: announce United Nations International Day of Peace
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for the reason to give a 24 hour
military cease fire to allow people
to give an answer to the problem
that may return the peace to the 
people of a given region of the world
and keep it that way

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
